mapper.sql: station_id, trainNum, station, outTime, dayTime, statiPrice
mapper.select: select from station where trainNum=#{trainnum} and station=#{station};
mapper.insert:
insert into station
station_id,
trainNum,
station,
outTime,
dayTime,
statiPrice,

mapper.update:
update station
trainNum = #{trainnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
station = #{station,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
outTime = #{outtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dayTime = #{daytime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
statiPrice = #{statiprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update station set trainNum = #{trainnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, station = #{station,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outTime = #{outtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dayTime = #{daytime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, statiPrice = #{statiprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
